title: Madison Ell
text:
Madison Ell



I am currently a fourth year Statistics undergraduate student at University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) . Prior to joining UCLA, I obtained my AS degree in Mathematics at Fullerton College. You can learn more about me from my CV.
Email: mell@g.ucla.edu
